mdRecord.dcterms:title: Microscope
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bausch & Lomb Optical Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Compound microscope, serial number 55035. It is engraved with Arthur H. Thomas Co., Philadelphia, Pa., H.L. 16, on one arm of the U shaped base and Bausch & Lomb Optical, Rochester N.Y. on the other arm of the base. It is also engraved with Bausch & Lomb Opt. Co. H.L. 11, Rochester N.Y on the top of one of the objectives. All three of the objectives are engraved Bausch & Lomb Optical Co. It was probably used at the UVA School of Medicine at one time as a student microscope.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
